segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos unfolding inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the path and the low bushes, everything so tidy and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me appreciate the beauty of nature and the tranquility it brings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in so much light, illuminating the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step into that garden and leave the mess behind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world seems so perfect compared to the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how serene life can be, away from the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of longing, looking at that garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a beautiful escape from the madness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
